title.rendered: The Latest in Biotech Jobs: January 2018

content.rendered:
Are you interested in a new biotech career this year? ClinLab Staffing agency works with life science, pharmaceutical, and biotech organizations to manage their staffing needs and bring exciting new job opportunities to you. See what jobs have been available so far this January.

Biomedical Engineer
Durham, NC

Our Client, an exciting start-up in Durham, is seeking a candidate to support cell isolation, extraction, and expansion activities. The technologist may also assist with donor recruitment, collection, transportation, processing, product release, and quality assurance activities. The position requires a high level of attention to detail, and manual dexterity. Rigorous training, competency assessment and proficiency testing will be a part of the process. read more… 

Production Manager, Full-time, Permanent
Raleigh, NC

  • Responsibilities:
    Under direction of the Plant Manager, this position determines and directs operations, plans, policies, and organization consistent with Company policies and directly supervises their applications to the areas of responsibility.Operations include one or more of the following areas: Component Preparation, Solution Formulation, Filling, Autoclaving, and Packaging of Vials and Syringes.
    read more…

    Submit your application to ClinLab Staffing today for the opportunity to be placed in biotech job that is best for you. Resumes can be submitted to: info@clinlabstaffing.com.
